function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 causing disruption in construction industry workforce","Impact":"Decreased construction activity, impact on goods and services transportation, and economic sustainability","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols, provide remote work options, and invest in technology for contactless operations","Technologies":"Remote work software, contactless equipment operation technology, and health safety monitoring systems","People":"Construction workers, commuters, and low-earning populations","Owner":"Construction companies, government authorities, and industry organizations"}]}
